Body.Content:
Starting on September 3, 2025, the classic Power Platform admin center (PPAC) experience will have reached an end of support. The new PPAC offers improved features and enhanced management experience.

How does this affect me?
As access to the classic admin center will end on September 3, 2025, users need to begin the transition to the new PPAC as soon as possible for task management to avoid interrupted administration and leverage the latest enhancements.

What action do I need to take?
Please transition to the new PPAC and reference the Use the new and improved Power Platform admin center learn article for further assistance.

Title: Power Platform admin center â€“ Information regarding the end of support for classic PPAC
